  <body class="layout-one-sidebar layout-sidebar-first page-node-836 path-node node--type-page">
    <a href="#main-content" class="visually-hidden-focusable">
      Skip to main content
    </a>
    
      <div class="dialog-off-canvas-main-canvas" data-off-canvas-main-canvas>
    
<div id="page-wrapper">
  <div id="page">
    <header id="header" class="header" role="banner" aria-label="Site header">
                        <nav class="navbar navbar-light bg-primary" id="navbar-top">
                    <div class="container">
                        
                <section class="row region region-top-header">
    <div id="block-royalobservatoryofbelgium" class="block-content-basic block block-block-content block-block-content2ad5e872-95c5-4e78-9da0-b3f409d99f6a">
  <div id="collapsiblock-wrapper-royalobservatoryofbelgium" class="collapsiblockTitle" data-collapsiblock-action="2">
    </div>
      <div class="content">
      
            <div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field__item"><div class="container-fluid" data-bootstrap-contains="containers" style="padding-left:0em;">
<div class="container" style="padding-left:0em;">
<div class="row" style="padding-left:0em;">
<div class="col-12" style="padding-left:0.5em;"><a href="https://www.astro.oma.be/en/"><img src="/logo/ROB34x24.png" style="margin-left: 0.5em; margin-right: 1em;"><span style="color:#a2d2f6;">Royal Observatory</span> <span style="color:#e5e5e5;"><em>of</em> Belgium</span></a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<script src="//cdn.public.n1ed.com/N1D8DFLT/widgets.js"></script>
</div>
      
    </div>
  </div>

  </section>

                      </li>


  
  <li id="main-menu-link-content0a9940dd-655c-4e0f-87ec-ef2a32a11ccf" class="sf-depth-2 sf-no-children" role="none">
              <a href="/activities/modeling" title="Modeling by the SIDC" class="sf-depth-2" role="menuitem">Modeling</a>
                      </li>


  
  <li id="main-menu-link-content44394c73-448d-4198-9261-532a0f4b039d" class="sf-depth-2 sf-no-children" role="none">
              <a href="/activities/supporting-research" title="Research Training by the SIDC" class="sf-depth-2" role="menuitem">Supporting Research</a>
                      </li>


  
  <li id="main-menu-link-content493b8251-973a-4352-8839-9ad812329f33" class="sf-depth-2 sf-no-children" role="none">
              <a href="/activities/data-processing" title="Data Processing and Distribution" class="sf-depth-2" role="menuitem">Data Processing</a>
                      </li>


  
  <li id="main-menu-link-contenta536936e-7d5d-4d78-8976-1ddc15a47bcf" class="sf-depth-2 sf-no-children" role="none">
              <a href="/activities/demelab" title="awesome laboratory" class="sf-depth-2" role="menuitem">DeMeLab</a>
                      </li>


      </ul>              </li>


</ul>

    </div>
  </div>


                	          </div>
                                            </div>
                  </nav>
    </header>
          <div class="highlighted">
        <aside class="container section clearfix" role="complementary">
            <div data-drupal-messages-fallback class="hidden"></div>


        </aside>
      </div>
            <div id="main-wrapper" class="layout-main-wrapper clearfix">
              <div id="main" class="container">
          
          <div class="row row-offcanvas row-offcanvas-left clearfix">
              <main class="main-content col" id="content" role="main">
                <section class="section">
                  <a id="main-content" tabindex="-1"></a>
                    <div id="block-sidc-barrio-page-title" class="block block-core block-page-title-block">
  
    
      <div class="content">
      
  <h1 class="title"><span class="field field--name-title field--type-string field--label-hidden">Monthly mean total sunspot number </span>
</h1>


    </div>
  </div>
<div id="block-sidc-barrio-content" class="block block-system block-system-main-block">
  <div id="collapsiblock-wrapper-sidc_barrio_content" class="collapsiblockTitle" data-collapsiblock-action="2">
    </div>
      <div class="content">
      

<article data-history-node-id="836" class="node node--type-page node--view-mode-full clearfix">
  <header>
    
        
      </header>
  <div class="node__content clearfix">
      <div class="layout layout--onecol">
    <div class="layout__region layout__region--content">
      <div class="block block-layout-builder block-field-blocknodepagebody">
  <div id="collapsiblock-wrapper-field-blocknodepagebody-00d1eff8-fdcc-4bcf-86f7-78ce6b4c15b8" class="collapsiblockTitle" data-collapsiblock-action="2">
    </div>
      <div class="content">
      
            <div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field__item"><p>Time range: 1/1749 - last elapsed month (provisional values)</p>
<p>Data description:<br></br>
Monthly mean total sunspot number obtained by taking a simple arithmetic mean of the daily total sunspot number over all days of each calendar month. Monthly means are available only since 1749 because the original observations compiled by Rudolph Wolf were too sparse before that year. (Only yearly means are available back to 1700)<br></br>
A value of -1 indicates that no number is available (missing value).</p>
<p>Error values:<br></br>
The monthly standard deviation of individual data is derived from the daily values by:    sigma(m)=sqrt(SUM(N(d)*sigma(d)^2)/SUM(N(d)))<br></br>
where sigma(d) is the standard deviation for a single day and N(d) is the<br></br>
number of observations for that day.<br></br>
The standard error on the monthly mean values can be computed by:<br></br>
sigma/sqrt(N) where sigma is the listed standard deviation and N the total number of observations in the month.</p>
<p>NB: February 1824 does not contain any daily value. As it is the only month without data after 1749, the monthly mean value was interpolated by R. Wolf between the adjacent months.<br></br>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br></br>
TXT<br></br>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br></br>
Filename: SN_m_tot_V2.0.txt<br></br>
Format: plain ASCII text</p>
<p>Contents:<br></br>
Column 1-2: Gregorian calendar date<br></br>
 - Year<br></br>
 - Month<br></br>
Column 3: Date in fraction of year for the middle of the corresponding month<br></br>
Column 4: Monthly mean total sunspot number.<br></br>
Column 5: Monthly mean standard deviation of the input sunspot numbers from individual stations.<br></br>
Column 6: Number of observations used to compute the monthly mean total sunspot number.<br></br>
Column 7: Definitive/provisional marker. A blank indicates that the value is definitive. A '*' symbol indicates that the monthly value is still provisional and is subject to a possible revision (Usually the last 3 to 6 months)</p>
<p>Line format [character position]:<br></br>
 - [1-4]   Year<br></br>
 - [6-7]   Month<br></br>
 - [9-16]  Decimal date<br></br>
 - [19-23] Monthly total sunspot number<br></br>
 - [25-29] Standard deviation<br></br>
 - [32-35] Number of observations<br></br>
 - [37]    Definitive/provisional indicator</p>
<p>-------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br></br>
CSV<br></br>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br></br>
Filename: SN_m_tot_V2.0.csv<br></br>
Format: Comma Separated values (adapted for import in spreadsheets)<br></br>
        The separator is the semicolon ';'.</p>
<p>Contents:<br></br>
Column 1-2: Gregorian calendar date<br></br>
 - Year<br></br>
 - Month<br></br>
Column 3: Date in fraction of year.<br></br>
Column 4: Monthly mean total sunspot number.<br></br>
Column 5: Monthly mean standard deviation of the input sunspot numbers.<br></br>
Column 6: Number of observations used to compute the monthly mean total sunspot number.<br></br>
Column 7: Definitive/provisional marker. '1' indicates that the value is definitive. '0' indicates that the value is still provisional.</p>
<p>-------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br></br>
LICENSE<br></br>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br></br>
SILSO data is under CC BY-NC4.0 license (<a href="https://goo.gl/PXrLYd">https://goo.gl/PXrLYd</a>) which means you can :</p>
<p>Share — copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format<br></br>
Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material</p>
<p>As long as you follow the license terms:</p>
<p>Attribution — You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use.<br></br>
NonCommercial — You may not use the material for commercial purposes.<br></br>
No additional restrictions — You may not apply legal terms or technological measures that legally restrict others from doing anything the license permits.</p>
</div>
      
    </div>
  </div>
<div class="block block-layout-builder block-extra-field-blocknodepagelinks">
  <div id="collapsiblock-wrapper-extra-field-blocknodepagelinks-cb2b1b9b-5fc4-436e-a3c3-174965b1db3f" class="collapsiblockTitle" data-collapsiblock-action="2">
    </div>
      <div class="content">
      


    </div>
  </div>

    </div>
  </div>

  </div>
</article>

    </div>
  </div>


                </section>
              </main>
                          <div class="sidebar_first sidebar col-md-3 order-first" id="sidebar_first">
                <aside class="section" role="complementary">
                    <div id="block-sisologo" class="block-content-basic block block-block-content block-block-contentcb08d79c-0df3-425c-b6b5-b105f4af3e1e">
  
    
      <div class="content">
      
            <div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field__item"><div style="text-align: center;">

</div>

  </div>
